GenericListIterator
typedef struct
GenericListIterator

A struct that represents an iterator for a generic list.

General usage is as follows:

GenericList *list=new(GenericList);
...
GenericListIterator *iter=GenericList_t.iterator.begin(list,NULL);
GenericListIterator *end=GenericList_t.iterator.end(list,NULL);
for ( ; equals(GenericListIterator,iter,end)!=0; GenericList_t.iterator.next(list,iter)){
  void* iterVal=GenericList_t.iterator.getVal(list,iter);
  ...
}
delete(GenericListIterator,iter);
delete(GenericListIterator,end);
...
delete(GenericList,list);
See Also

GenericList GenericList_t GenericListIterator_t

Variables
index
int index

  • Default: 0

GenericListIterator_t
extern const struct
GenericListIterator_t

The struct that creates and performs operations on objects of type GenericListIterator.
